722736f-a.text:
One of the largest celebrations of Bastille Day took place at the Joan of Arc Statue, Riverside Drive and 93rd Street, under the auspices of the Joan of Arc Statue Committee and the American
Defense Soc.
July,1918 International Films Service
E0 ~ 37E

722900f-c.text:
Riverside Park: The Hudson River Yacht Club at the foot of West 90th Street. Buildings on the right, line the easterly side of Riverside Drive and overlook the
park and the river.
April 29, 1934
Views: 1-2-3
P. L. Sperr
